questions.quote: I'm just gonna heat this up. Make a little hot-tub for Little Jerry.
Yeah. Kramer's the only person who could say something like that.
Oh...yeah. I got my new plates. But they mixed them up. Somebody got mine and I got their *vanity* plates.
Oh. it's always simulated....except with George that's in my contract.
Trust me, Kramer. Given the legal opportunity, I will kill you.
I couldn't help it. We hadn't been alone in a long time, it just got the better of me.
I'm not going to 'Skyburger'. Besides, it's in the opposite direction, let's just eat popcorn or something.
Yeah, I think I will. I like the idea of having the law on my side.
Well, the whole deal going down tomorrow. Morty's gonna miss his plane for it.
No, not nervous. I'm good, very good.  I can't do this! Can't do this!
